Segment.name: CRS
Segment.comment: To provide the receiving institution or organization with information about courses taken and the status of those courses

Field.name: BasisForAcademicCreditOrAwardOfCredentialCode
Field.comment: Code indicating how academic credit or a credential was granted by an institution or earned by an individual

Field.name: AcademicCreditTypeCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of credit used (awarded) by the institution

Field.name: Quantity1
Field.comment: Numeric value of quantity

Field.name: Quantity2
Field.comment: Numeric value of quantity

Field.name: AcademicGradeQualifier
Field.comment: The grading scale used by an academic institution for an academic course

Field.name: AcademicGrade
Field.comment: This indicates the grade received in an academic course

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: AcademicGradeOrCourseLevelCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the level or type or both, of work which is reflected in the grade average and the credit hours or the credential assessment

Field.name: CourseRepeatOrNoCountIndicatorCode
Field.comment: Code indicating when an academic course has been repeated by a student and how that repeat is to be computed in the student's academic grade average

Field.name: IdentificationCodeQualifier
Field.comment: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

Field.name: IdentificationCode
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

Field.name: Quantity3
Field.comment: Numeric value of quantity

Field.name: LevelOfIndividualTestOrCourseCode
Field.comment: Code identifying level of course, test, or individual

Field.name: Name1
Field.comment: Free-form name

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: Name2
Field.comment: Free-form name

Field.name: Quantity4
Field.comment: Numeric value of quantity

Field.name: Quantity5
Field.comment: Numeric value of quantity

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: OverrideAcademicCourseSourceCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the source of academic credit if not from the sending educational institution
